text:
Hey guys,

does anyone know how to get *next* and *previous* <rowId> of the HubDB table ? I have *current* rowID in the URL.
Thank you in advance !

Hey! Does anyone knows if there is a way to acces the "site tree" object in hubl. I would like to get a list of child page id's for a parent page. Have been looking around in the content_by_id object but no luck there

HELLO peeps

Question, is there any way to add an inline help text (or any help text) to this:
```{% choice "page_type" label='Page Type', value='start',
    choices='[ [ "start", "Start" ], [ "default", "Default" ], [ "product", "Product" ], [ "pillar", "Pillar" ], [ "learn", "Learn" ], [ "contact", "Contact Us" ] ]',
    export_to_template_context=True %}```

Hello, my name is Thiago. How are you all doing?

I need to customize the header of my pages on HubSpot, but the pages are in the same language, so the header variation option would not work because it is in the same language.

Has anyone ever experienced this?
